en: It explores and analyzes the replies of a tweet classifying them, offering statistics and tools to filter the tweet responses.
What is the URL of the Tweet you want to start exploring from?
No one has replied to this tweet so there is no further analysis we can perform.
All the replies occurred on the same day so the pie chart gives a clearer breakdown than a histogram would.

the page to check for more replies.

That's all the replies, so far...

There are no URLs within the selected replies

We automatically assign one of four possible labels to each reply based on how they support, refute, query, or just comment on the Tweet. This pie chart shows the proportion of these labels across all the replies to this Tweet, which we have processed so far.
This histogram shows how the replies, and thier labels, occur over time. Initially we show 7 days after the tweet, but you can select a different time period by dragging the axis or range selector.
This section allows you to explore the replies to the Tweet, including the ability to filter the replies to allow you to focus on certain types or content.
